mapper.insert: insert into t_repair_order (repair_id, repair_num, driver_name, driver_num, commit_name, checker_name, repair_status, vehicle_num, tenant_id, repair_message, create_time, appointment_time, get_time, update_time, end_time, repair_progress, contact_name, contact_tel, remark, pick_goods_id, order_type, farm, vin, engine_no, process_instance_id, task_id, dealer_name) values (#{repairId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{getTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repairProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType}, #{farm}, #{vin}, #{engineNo}, #{processInstanceId}, #{taskId}, #{dealerName})

mapper.update:
update t_repair_order
repair_num = #{repairNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_num = #{driverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commit_name = #{commitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checker_name = #{checkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repair_status = #{repairStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vehicle_num = #{vehicleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repair_message = #{repairMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
appointment_time = #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
get_time = #{getTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repair_progress = #{repairProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_tel = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pick_goods_id = #{pickGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{orderType},
farm = #{farm},
vin = #{vin},
engine_no = #{engineNo},
process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId},
task_id = #{taskId}
dealer_name = #{dealerName}
where repair_id = #{repairId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_repair_order set repair_num = #{repairNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_num = #{driverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commit_name = #{commitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checker_name = #{checkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repair_status = #{repairStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicle_num = #{vehicleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repair_message = #{repairMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, appointment_time = #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, get_time = #{getTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repair_progress = #{repairProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_tel = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pick_goods_id = #{pickGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType},farm = #{farm}, vin = #{vin}, engine_no = #{engineNo}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId}, task_id = #{taskId}, dealer_name = #{dealerName} where repair_id = #{repairId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select a.repair_id as repairId, a.repair_num as repairNum, a.driver_name as driverName, a.driver_num as driverNum, a.commit_name as commitName, a.checker_name as checkerName, a.repair_status as repairStatus, a.vehicle_num as vehicleNum, a.tenant_id as tenantId, a.repair_message as repairMessage, a.create_time as createTime, a.appointment_time as appointmentTime, a.get_time as getTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.end_time as endTime, a.repair_progress as repairProgress, a.contact_name as contactName, a.contact_tel as contactTel, a.remark as remark, a.pick_goods_id as pickGoodsId, a.order_type as orderType, a.farm as farm, a.vin , a.engine_no as engineNo, a.task_id as taskId, a.dealer_name = #{dealerName} from t_repair_order as a where 1 = 1
and a.repairNum like concat('%',#{repairNum}, '%')
and a.vehicle_num like concat('%',#{vehicleNum}, '%')
and a.order_type like concat('%',#{orderType}, '%')
and a.farm like concat('%',#{farm}, '%')
